title: Nightmare Cinema ft. Rich DietZ
description:
Dirty Not Sorry and Housology present: Nightmare Cinema !!

Rave inside the Haunted movie theatre this Halloween with headliner Rich DietZ of Hood Politics Records + more!

Step into a Halloween experience like no other — a former movie theatre on Market Street transformed into a haunted dancefloor. Expect chilling décor, killer costumes, and a world-class sound and lighting system that shakes the room with cinematic precision.

### **Headliner:**

**► Rich DietZ**


[Instagram.com/richdietzofficial](https://www.instagram.com/richdietzofficial/)


Hailing from New Jersey, DJ/producer duo Rich DietZ are known for transforming every venue into a full-blown party. Their signature sound — a bold fusion of Tech House and Bass House — has earned releases on Musical Freedom, Confession, Hood Politics, and DND Records, plus support from Tiësto, Swedish House Mafia, Diplo, Dom Dolla, and more. With appearances at EDC, Tomorrowland, Ultra, and clubs like Bootshaus, Echostage, and Élia Beach Club, Rich DietZ continue to bring their infectious energy to dance floors around the world.

### **Support:**
